item.title: OpenShift - Cluster Log Forwarding to Apache Pulsar
item.description: This article will be showcase procedure on how to forward logs from Openshift Container Platform to Apache Pulsar via Kafka. OpenShift - Cluster Log Forwarding to Apache Pulsar
